Easingwold, North Yorkshire, England, UK Best Basses on the Stage: Fishburn
Sectional Awards: Best Second Section Band: Wansbeck Ashington 179 (N. Stedman) Best Third Section: Slaithwaite 175 (Barry Hudson)
Deportment Contest
1st. Dobcross Silver 2nd. Marsden Silver 3rd. Holme Silver 4th. Fishburn
Best Trombones on the march: Fishburn Best Fourth Section: Gawthorpe Brass (Derek Hoyle)

Overall winner: (Highest aggregate points) TIE
Two bands Dobcross and Marsden tied for the overall winners title. The prize was awarded to Marsden as they scored the higher marks in the Contest March on stage.
